channel.title: Uae-North on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Uae-North on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Front Door Premium now supports Azure Private Link origins in UAE North
item.description:
Azure Front Door Premium (public preview) now supports configuring Azure Private Link-enabled origins in the UAE North region.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: DCa/ECa v6 series AMD based confidential virtual machines (VMs)
item.description:
Microsoft announced general availability of DCa/ECa v6 AMD-based confidential virtual machines in several regions, built on 4th generation AMD hardware.

  • Source: Azure Updates
